mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (email, password, salt, signAt, passwordAlertAt, nickname, profileImageUrl, name, birthDate, sex, telecomValue, contact, zipcode, address, addressDetail, agreedTermAt, agreedMarketingAt) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{salt}, NOW(), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MINUTE), #{nickname}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{name}, #{birthDate}, #{sex}, #{telecomValue}, #{contact}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET profileImageUrl = #{profileImageUrl}, nickname = #{nickname}, password = #{password}, salt = #{salt}, telecomValue = #{telecomValue}, contact = #{contact}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address = #{address}, addressDetail = #{addressDetail} WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE members SET statusValue = "DEL" WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM memberBlock WHERE nickname = #{nickname} and blockedMember = ${blockedMember}
